entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Loading page blends into the next page on shell navigation Xaiomi android 12 JOYUI 13 22.06.20 #12894
  • [iOS] Image in StackLayout in Shell.FlyoutHeader is not visible #12892
  • Reassigning Picker.ItemsSource does not trigger refresh of page #12891
  • Vibration only works when the application is in foreground #12880
  • [iOS] Image.HeightRequest not respected when Image added in an Horizontal StackLayout #12879
  • ApplicationVerificationFailed: Failed to verify code signature. Can't debug app on device. #12877
  • CaptureAsync() doesn't save Maps content #12876
  • SwipeView Icon is not working on iOS #12875
    Backlog

Closed

  • WebView do not ask permissions for Video and Mic #12283
  • Editing text in a searchbar on Android .NET 7 RC1 does not have the expected behavior. #10323
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Tabs within the shell do not execute override the OnAppearing method #8102
    Backlog
  • Static Color methods not converting values e.g Color.FromRgba #9232
  • Windows content page(C#) cannot be hot reloaded #6035
    Backlog
  • Height of `<Entry>` cannot be changed on Windows #12831
  • iOS: Application crashes after displaying SplashScreen #12809
  • VS 2022 MAUI : App does not show mainpage on windows machine #12651
  • [Tooling] [Scenario Day] XAML Live Preview not update selection #7132
    Backlog
  • When renaming a newly added XAML page in Visual Studio 2022 only the filename gets changed #7568
  • Android Emulator would not start #7750
  • XAML Binding errors not being reported on Output OR XAML Binding Failure #12035
    Backlog
  • HotReload doesn't work on .Net7 when targeting Windows (it seems to work on Android) #12274
  • Fail to Install App on iOS Simulator 'Could not load the framework DVItunesSoftwareServiceFoundation' #12770
  • MAUI Template manifest invalid - not replacing $placeholders$ and no Capabilities available. #8354

PullRequests

Created

  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12888
    area/toolbar
  • Use the CommunityToolkit.Mvvm messenger instead of MessagingCenter in the samples #12885
  • [iOS] Fix issue using SVG in SwipeItem Icon #12882
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Avoid to disconnect a disposed PlatformView on Android #12881
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12872
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [net7.0] Fix count comparison when switching tabs #12886
  • [release/7.0.1xx-sr3] Fix count comparison when switching tabs #12887
  • Fix count comparison when switching tabs #12884
  • [Actions] Github actions do not support double quotes on expressions. #12871
    community ✨

Updated

  • Ensure flyout detail updated on Android Tablet side-by-side layout on navigation push of 2nd page #12754
    community ✨
  • Update HOWTOBUILD for MAUI #12869
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix initial page and back button Navigation events #12348
    area/navigation 🧭
  • Make MediaPicker capture methods work in Android 13+ #12766
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    community ✨
